lines.text: No man's born ready for marriage; he has to be trained.
Wives may be a little extra trouble now and then, but they're mighty handy gadgets to have around the house.
I'm going next door. Where the scheming widow lives.
No one cares for brandy, Lottie, I've already asked them.
She could build a nest in his ear and he'd never know it.
The only difference is that Lottie wants to stay, and I don't!
